question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect too state legislative council?
1. It is a permanent body
2. It is not subject to dissolution
3. One-third of its members retire on the expiration of every third year
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The legislative council of state is a continuing chamber. It is a permanent body and is not subject to dissolution. One-third of its members retire on the expiration of every second year.
